duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform maintenance and alteration tasks on civil aviation articles in accordance with the current technical data.
Test, troubleshoot, and verify the functionality of limited fuel, oil, or air accessories using hand tools and specialty tools.
Read and interpret technical data and drawings for components testing.
Document maintenance records of all repair work orders performed.
Maintain an orderly and productive work environment in compliance with industry standard practices.

education_certification.credential: High mechanical aptitude. 1-3 years of aviation accessory experience. Basic computer operating skills.
